onboard-1-body: Everyday people around the world are being connected to one another via social media. And yet, with all this technology, we still don't have a way to connect with people who live next door to us.
onboard-2-body: Habichat uses your postal code to connect you with your community - habichat is a group chat with everyone in your neighbourhood. Share as much or as little as you like and there's no need for a Facebook or Twitter to sign up.
onboard-3-body: Plan a barbeque, sell your items, ask advice or just say hello in an unobtrusive way to the people who live nearby. We believe that proximity to special people matters, and we want to make your life better everyday.
canadian-phone-error: Please enter a Canadian phone number.
habichat-not-available: Habichat hasn't launched in your community, but we're working on it. Promise!
never-miss-an-update: and we'll let you know as soon as we launch!
